mainpage.title: Gentoo Stores
mainpage.abstract: This document lists the places that Gentoo merchandise may be purchased.

body.p: Gentoo merchanise may be purchased from the following vendors who have been licenced to use the Gentoo Logo by either the Gentoo Foundation Inc (in the USA) or Friends of Gentoo eV within the European Union
Approved Vendors make a small contribution to Gentoo from sales of Gentoo related merchandise.
Please do not buy from unlicenced vendors but we would like to hear about any that you spot. Please email the trustees
Offical Gentoo Cafepress Store located in the USA
Techiant, LLC for Case and Laptop Badges located in the USA
Offical Friends of Gentoo e.V Store located in Germany
If you buy something from a licenced vendor and you like it, tell all your friends.

If you have problems with quality or the vendor, please tell us and the vendor. We do not undertake to resolve individual issues but we take the quality of goods bearing our logo very seriously indeed.
If you would like a listing here please email the trustees
A listing on this page is included in the licence.
Gentoo has to defend its registered marks to prevent them becoming public domain and we try to do it in the friendy way that is the hallmark of the open source community.
